Object.Field: COMPONENT NAME: LKM Hive to SQL SQOOP COMPONENT VERSION: 1 AUTHOR: Oracle COMPATIBILITY: ODI 12.1.3.0.1 and above DESCRIPTION: This KM integrates data from Hive into a JDBC target. It executes the following steps: 1. Unload data into HDFS 2. Create a SQOOP configuration file 3. Load data using SQOOP into a work table on RDBMS 4. Drop the work table Additional information can be found on KM option descriptions as well as in the Oracle BigDataConnector User's Guide.
SNP_TRT : HiveSqoopBaseLKM #SNP_LINETRT : Create Temporary Indexes on Stage
SNP_TRT : HiveSqoopExportBaseLKM #SNP_LINETRT : Cleanup SQOOP option file
osCmd = '''hadoop fs -rm -r ''' + HIVE_SQOOP_INSERT.getSourceDir() outFileName = '''<$=sqoopStdOutFileName$>''' errFileName = '''<$=sqoopErrFileName$>''' dsLocation = 'SRC'
osCmd = '''hadoop fs -rm -r ''' + HIVE_SQOOP_INSERT.getSourceDir() outFileName = '''<$=sqoopStdOutFileName$>''' errFileName = '''<$=sqoopErrFileName$>''' dsLocation = 'SRC'
SNP_TRT : HiveSqoopExportBaseLKM #SNP_LINETRT : Create SQOOP option file
SNP_TRT : HiveSqoopExportBaseLKM #SNP_LINETRT : Cleanup Teradata Connector work table
SNP_TRT : HiveSqoopExportBaseLKM #SNP_LINETRT : Drop Teradata Connector work table
LKM Hive to SQL SQOOP.Cleanup SQOOP input dir
